STEALING HOME (1988)

Drama, Romance

Billy Wyatt is a down-on-his-luck, washed-up baseball player who is called back home to handle the ashes of his childhood sweetheart, his first love who had abruptly ended her own life. As he searches for what best to do with her ashes, he recalls vividly all that she taught him, all that they had shared and in doing so, he begins to discover himself once again.
